mapper.select: select id as id, encrypt_password as encryptPassword, name as name, email as email, created_date as createdDate, updated_date as updatedDate from sample_users where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into sample_users (id, encrypt_password, name, email, created_date, updated_date) values (#{id}, #{encryptPassword}, #{name}, #{email}, now(), now())
